about_the_game:
In this cyberpunk-style game setting, the world is divided between humans and robots disguised in human skins, highlighting a deep-seated animosity between the two groups. The protagonist, a scrap collector, stumbles upon a significant conspiracy by chance.

KEY FEATURES
• Dynamic AI Learning: The game features AI that evolves and learns from player interactions, enhancing its tactics over time.


• Open World Exploration: Experience boundless freedom in a cyberpunk world with the flying cars, letting you explore the futuristic cityscape at your own pace.


INCLUDES
• New Game Plus mode, enabling players to revisit the game with enhanced challenges and the opportunity to collect key points of Robabekya for a deeper understanding of the narrative.

Smart Artificial Intelligence
In my game, I've developed a sophisticated AI system that enhances player interaction through advanced learning and adaptive capabilities. My smart AI characters dynamically build their knowledge and skills by interacting not only with the main player but also with other NPCs in the game world. This accumulated experience is then stored within the game's save files, allowing AI to remember past encounters and decisions.

What sets my AI apart is its ability to learn quickly and creatively. It can integrate new actions and strategies on-the-fly, resulting in unique gameplay experiences for each session. For example, during gameplay, AI NPCs can combine different actions from their actions like crouching while chasing a player or taking cover and crouching more so that encounters feel fresh and unpredictable.

When a player deletes his save game, it resets the AI's learned experiences. This means that initially, AI behavior might seem random, but over time, as they interact with the player and other characters, they become more strategic and responsive. For instance, if a player had a previous encounter with a cop NPC where the 23rd cop was hit and killed while standing near the player, the next time the player faces that cop, he might find that the NPC has learned to crouch when approaching the player to avoid being an easy target.

This adaptive behavior ensures that each playthrough offers a dynamic and evolving challenge, where AI characters continuously evolve based on their interactions and experiences within the game world. It adds depth to gameplay as players encounter increasingly intelligent and nuanced opponents who adapt to their tactics and decisions.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10/11 64 Bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4690 | AMD FX-8350
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 780 (3 GB) | AMD Radeon R9 290 (4 GB)
  • Storage: 35 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: SSD Required
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10/11 64 Bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-4770K | Ryzen 5 1500X
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 1060 (6 GB) | AMD Radeon RX 580 (8 GB)
  • Storage: 35 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: SSD Required
